=================================
Subscripts: missing number recover
=================================

# Missing number after xi should not crash; parser should recover with a missing node

lo klama xi cu klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (lo) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla) (subscript (xi (MISSING number))))))) (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla)))))
